Notes of Fall

October  



As the Halloween season comes to an end so has the scare of rising gas prices PERIOD The average price of gasoline continue to fall from the record high prices set just a few weeks ago PERIOD

According to the fuelguagereport.com several gas stations in San Diego east county region began selling a gallon of gasoline for . pERIOD According to figures from the AAA and Oil Price Information Service the average price is  cents less than one week ago but  cents more than one month ago and  cents higher than one year ago PERIOD

Even though gas prices are dropping PERIOD California drivers are paying the highest gas prices in the nation PERIOD According to fuelguagereport.com the average gallon of gas in California is . per gallon PERIOD Thats  cents more per gallon than the national average of . per gallon PERIOD

Gas Prices As Of Early NovemberPhoto By Antoine

During October  California state officials allowed gas station owners to start selling their winter blend fuel earlier than normally scheduled date in November in an attempt to combat with rising gas prices PERIOD

Selling our winter blend fuel has definitely afforded us along with other fueling stations the opportunity to lower prices for drivers. said RuwaidHauko an attendant at a local gas station in east county PERIOD

Only time will tell how long the gas prices will continue to drop PERIOD The price of gasoline only drops when gas stations suppliers drop their price of gasoline said Silver Palender a gas station attendant in east county PERIOD

With the holiday season peaking around the corner money is tight as families prepare for celebrations and high gas prices could dampen their holidays PERIOD As the temperature continues to drop gas prices are hopeful to do the same PERIOD
